entry.title: [RBX4][Dedicated Servers] - 46L12
entry.content:
Dec 4, 21:45 UTC
Resolved - Start time : 04/12/2022 13:33 UTC
End Time : 04/12/2022 21:36 UTC
Root cause :A network hardware needed to be changed
Service status :Our technical teams resolved the issue. All impacted services are now operational.

Dec 4, 21:14 UTC
Update - We are continuing to work on a fix for this issue.

Dec 4, 20:16 UTC
Identified - Start time : 04/12/2022 13:33 UTC
Service impact : The vrack on this rack 46L12 is currently unvailable.
Root cause : A failure on a network equipment.
Ongoing actions : Our technical teams are working on the issue. Update will be post as significant progress are made.

Dec 4, 18:50 UTC
Investigating - Start time : 04/12/2022 13:33 UTC
Service impact : The vrack on this rack 46L12 is currently unvailable.
